00033 #ifndef __LWIP_PBUF_H__
00034 #define __LWIP_PBUF_H__
00035 
00036 #include "arch/cc.h"
00037 
00038 
00039 #define PBUF_TRANSPORT_HLEN 20
00040 #define PBUF_IP_HLEN        20
00041 
00042 
00043 typedef enum {
00044   PBUF_TRANSPORT,
00045   PBUF_IP,
00046   PBUF_LINK,
00047   PBUF_RAW
00048 } pbuf_layer;
00049 
00050 typedef enum {
00051   PBUF_RAM,
00052   PBUF_ROM,
00053   PBUF_REF,
00054   PBUF_POOL
00055 } pbuf_flag;
00056 
00057 /* Definitions for the pbuf flag field (these are not the flags that
00058    are passed to pbuf_alloc()). */
00059 #define PBUF_FLAG_RAM   0x00U    /* Flags that pbuf data is stored in RAM */
00060 #define PBUF_FLAG_ROM   0x01U    /* Flags that pbuf data is stored in ROM */
00061 #define PBUF_FLAG_POOL  0x02U    /* Flags that the pbuf comes from the pbuf pool */
00062 #define PBUF_FLAG_REF   0x04U    /* Flags thet the pbuf payload refers to RAM */
00063 
00065 #define PBUF_FLAG_LINK_BROADCAST 0x80U
00066 
00067 struct pbuf {
00069   struct pbuf *next;
00070 
00072   void *payload;
00073   
00081   u16_t tot_len;
00082   
00083   /* length of this buffer */
00084   u16_t len;  
00085 
00086   /* flags telling the type of pbuf */
00087   u16_t flags;
00088   
00094   u16_t ref;
00095   
00096 };
00097 
00098 /* pbuf_init():
00099 
00100    Initializes the pbuf module. The num parameter determines how many
00101    pbufs that should be allocated to the pbuf pool, and the size
00102    parameter specifies the size of the data allocated to those.  */
00103 void pbuf_init(void);
00104 
00105 struct pbuf *pbuf_alloc(pbuf_layer l, u16_t size, pbuf_flag flag);
00106 void pbuf_realloc(struct pbuf *p, u16_t size); 
00107 u8_t pbuf_header(struct pbuf *p, s16_t header_size);
00108 void pbuf_ref(struct pbuf *p);
00109 void pbuf_ref_chain(struct pbuf *p);
00110 u8_t pbuf_free(struct pbuf *p);
00111 u8_t pbuf_clen(struct pbuf *p);  
00112 void pbuf_chain(struct pbuf *h, struct pbuf *t);
00113 struct pbuf *pbuf_take(struct pbuf *f);
00114 struct pbuf *pbuf_dechain(struct pbuf *p);
00115 
00116 #endif /* __LWIP_PBUF_H__ */
